short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View basic image information on hover

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Information Viewer is a simple and useful tool for photographers and web designers. 

When you hover over an image on any webpage, it instantly shows you key details about that image:

• Dimensions (width and height)
• File name
• Image format
• Alt text (if available)

This extension makes it easy to quickly check image properties without needing to download files or use separate tools. 

It's perfect for anyone who works with images online and needs quick access to basic image information.

Hover over any image to see its details appear in a small, unobtrusive popup. 

The extension is lightweight and works on all websites.

Developed by PhotoCultivator.com - your source for weekly photography tips, inspiration and best gear recommentions.
